data.heading: MEEAMI
data.description: Everybody has experienced poor call quality even on high-end phones when enabling Bluetooth, especially in vehicles. One can also tell if someone had dialed in or joined the conference through an IP network because invariably the dialed in person does not sound crisp and clear as others. That all goes away with Meeamiâ€™s AI SD2HD bandwidth extension. Now everyone will sound HD in a conference call irrespective of the device and the network they dial in from.
data.title: Speech Pro

cards.description: Our groundbreaking technology is designed to elevate the audio experience by extending the bandwidth of narrow band speech to the remarkable realm of Super Wide Band. This innovation breathes new life into audio content, enriching it with unprecedented clarity.
cards.title: Extends bandwidth of narrow band speech to Super Wide band

cards.description: Our cutting-edge technology is engineered to transcend the limitations of Bluetooth codecs, offering a transformative enhancement for audio quality. By conquering codec impairments, we deliver audio that reaches the pinnacle of Super Wideband quality, providing an audio experience that's rich
cards.title: Bluetooth codec Impairments: Enhances audio to super wideband

cards.description: Our pioneering technology is designed to transcend the challenges posed by VoIP codec impairments, delivering a remarkable enhancement for audio quality. By conquering these limitations, we elevate VoIP audio to the pinnacle of Super Wideband excellence.
cards.title: VoIP Codec Impairments: Enhances VoIP audio to super wide band

cards.description: Our technology is engineered for efficiency, designed to operate seamlessly on edge devices without imposing a significant resource burden. With a minimal footprint, it ensures that even devices with limited processing power and memory can benefit from its capabilities.
cards.title: Low footprint to run on edge devices

data.heading: Explore
data.description: Unlock the power of audio AI with our state-of-the-art tool designed to revolutionize your sound experiences. Embrace the future of sound with our audio AI tool and discover a world of endless possibilities at your fingertips.
data.title: Try it now to transform your soundscapes like never before.

data.heading: Use Cases
data.title: Remove Background Noise
data.description: Our cutting-edge AI Bandwidth Extension technology is engineered to provide an exceptional voice quality experience, even on legacy Bluetooth devices and legacy VoIP systems.
